rows.business_item_short_description: We report financial results for two segments: Family of Apps (FoA) and Reality Labs (RL).
rows.business_item_long_description: We report financial results for two segments: Family of Apps (FoA) and Reality Labs (RL). Currently, we generate substantially all of our revenue from selling advertising placements on our family of apps to marketers, which is reflected in FoA.
rows.evidence_span: We report financial results for two segments: Family of Apps (FoA) and Reality Labs (RL). Currently, we generate substantially all of our revenue from selling advertising placements on our family of apps to marketers, which is reflected in FoA.
